activities.loc: Grant County Courthouse - Br. I - 3rd Floor

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Darnell V Brinson

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Darnell V Brinson in court.  Attorney Mark Walter Frank in court for Darnell V Brinson.  Attorney Lisa A. Riniker in court for State of Wisconsin. Amy Hartwig sworn and testified. Exhibit #1- offered. Cross. Attorney Riniker heard and requests bind over. Attorney Frank objects to bind over and waives argument. Court binds matter over. Information filed. Defendant waives reading and stands mute. Court enters not guilty plea(s). Status date set.  Trial Weeks: January 3 2023 or January 10, 2023.
Status conference scheduled for December 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on December 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Defendant Darnell V Brinson in court.  Attorney Lisa A. Riniker in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant does qualify for SPD but an attorney has not been appointed yet. Preliminary hearing set.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for October 24, 2022 at 11:15 am.
Defendant shall go to the Public Defender's Office today.

Defendant Darnell V Brinson appeared by video from the Grant Co Jail.  Attorney Lisa A. Riniker in court for State of Wisconsin. Court explains charges, penalties and right to counsel. Defendant to contact public defender's office. State recommends signature bond. Court Sets $1000 signature bond with condition to contact public defender's office today. Status conference as to counsel scheduled for October 3, 2022 at 11:00 am.
